author: rhuijben
msg: Use svn_pool_create() instead of apr_pool_create() in ra_serf to enable
our check for OOM. (And to make grepping easier)
Replace all calls to apr_pool_create() with a call to svn_pool_create().

author: rhuijben
msg: Revert r38399. Even though constant is deprecated, it seems to have side
undocumented side effects breaking the build.

author: rhuijben
msg: Use DATA to specify that a variable is exported.

author: rhuijben
msg: [Note from the future: This was reverted in r38404.]
Make the path absolute, before assuming it is absolute to fix test on

author: rhuijben
msg: (merge_props_changed): Replace a call to svn_path_compare_paths() with a
call to strcmp() as the result for a zero check is equivalent.
